snippet.title: Rayman Raving Rabbids: Reburrowed - Reveal Trailer (Rayman Alive 2023)
snippet.description:
Rayman Raving Rabbids: Reburrowed is a fan made re-imagining of the original adventure game concept/idea for Rayman Raving Rabbids / Rayman 4.

When the glade of dreams is threatened by a devastating invasion of crazed, out-of-control bunnies, Rayman must rise up against his furry foes to foil their wicked plans.

If you wanna help out or get instant update news on the project, join our community discord: https://discord.gg/3nhwgCbRFe

Follow us on Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/R4Reburrowed

If you want to join the project you can sign up here!: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/19VZB-kC6hIKpYRfNou2s-5z5E-4LNDsBL_PBmPjDrq4/viewform 

TRAILER CREDITS:
Editing: Mikester
Intro Animation: Showin/MaeDaGoof
ZetaXO: Outro
XanderNT: Logo
